name: Fast Scanner - Bar Code Scanner & QR Scanner
description: Fast free scanner application and tag reader for URL ISBN contact text of WiFi products.  QR code and bar code scanners are free and can be used in Androids best and fastest QR code / bar code creators and scanner applications.  The app uses the phones camera to automatically scan and identify information about QR codes or bar codes.  All major bar code and QR code formats are supported.  Features  1. QR code reader.  2. Simple and easy to use.  3. Bar Code sweeper.  4. Always Scanning speed is fast.  5. Support low light environment flashlight.  6. Scanning history preservation.   It can read all types of text, URL, product, contact information, ISBN, calendar, email, location, wireless network and many other formats.  After scanning and automatic decoding, the user is provided with only individual type-related options and can take appropriate action.  QR code and bar code scanner is the best QR code scanner / QR scan / QR reader / bar code scanner gun / bar code reader!  Free bar code scanning application!
